org.gearvrf

Class GVROrthogonalCamera

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gearvrf.GVRHybridObject
      • org.gearvrf.GVRComponent
        • org.gearvrf.GVRCamera
          • org.gearvrf.GVROrthogonalCamera
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GVRCameraClippingDistanceInterface, PrettyPrint

    public class GVROrthogonalCamera
extends GVRCamera
implements GVRCameraClippingDistanceInterface
    A camera with an orthogonal projection.
